events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred last evening involving their car and another driver. Immediate claim filing initiated due to damage sustained.
The newly filed claim was categorized under Auto Accident following review of reported collision and damage descriptions provided by the customer.
A claims agent was assigned to handle this auto accident case to ensure proper follow-up and explanation of the claim process to the customer.
The customer was formally notified that their claim has been acknowledged and is now under review with full support from the insurance company.
The claims agent requested necessary documents including police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a copy of the repair estimate for further investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents promptly, including the accident report and repair bills to facilitate timely processing of the claim.
An internal investigation team began examining the details of the collision and verifying the authenticity of submitted materials to determine liability.
The investigation concluded successfully, confirming the accident circumstances and validating the damage reports provided by the customer.
Based on investigation findings, a settlement offer was proposed that covers the vehicle repair costs and related expenses as per the policy terms.
The customer provided positive feedback regarding clear communication and timely proposal of the settlement offer for their auto accident claim.
The claim was officially approved following customer acceptance of the settlement terms, confirming the insurer's commitment to cover all damages claimed.
The payment covering vehicle repairs and other associated costs was disbursed to the customer’s account as per the agreed settlement.
The auto accident claim was closed successfully after payment issuance and confirmation that the customer’s needs have been met to satisfaction.
All documentation and case files related to the closed auto accident claim were archived following company retention policies for future reference.
